name: rain (itch) (Z3RYX)
description:
rain is a simplistic "dodge the bullet" game, made for the Low Effort Jam 8.

The gameplay is very simplistic, as you only need to dodge left and right and stay dry for as long as possible.

It is worth noting that due to the math in the background, it shouldn't be possible to survive longer than 5 minutes, because from that point on the game will spawn droplets on each frame. The longer you don't get hit, the faster the droplets will come down.

Controls:

A & D or arrow keys: Move the player

Escape: Returns to Title (only on the Game Over screen)
